ShortDescription.Value: Modify the map/tile border size and color.

Publish.LongDescription:
# Boundary Lines Modifier Ever felt the border lines aren't good enough for you? Like they are too large, or shows up unnecessarily? This mod is just for you.
You can modify the width, tiling length, and separate colour for the map border and tiles border.
###- Requires reload of the save for the settings to apply.
Publish.ChangeLog: - Compatibility update for 1.3.3f1. - Vanilla Data is now dynamically collected to prevent accidental overwrite in case of game update.
